actions.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, Hazardous Materials and Pipeline Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, Hazardous Materials and Pipeline Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, Hazardous Materials and Pipeline Transportation

official_title: To amend title 49, United States Code, relating to the transportation of hazardous materials.

summary.text: Amends Federal transportation law to exempt food and distilled spirits from the requirement that the Secretary of Transportation designate certain materials as hazardous when deciding that transporting them in commerce in a particular amount or form may pose an unreasonable risk to health and safety or property.

titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, relating to the transportation of hazardous materials.
